name: BANCA UBAE, S.P.A., Petitioner, v. Deborah D. PETERSON, et al.
name_abbreviation: Banca Ubae, S. P.A. v. Peterson

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BANCA UBAE, S.P.A., Petitioner,
v.
Deborah D. PETERSON, et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit for further consideration in light of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020, Pub. casebody.head_matter:
BANCA UBAE, S.P.A., Petitioner,
v.
Deborah D. PETERSON, et al.
No. 17-1530
Supreme Court of the United States.
January 13, 2020
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit for further consideration in light of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020, Pub. L. No. 116-___ (S. 1790).
